channel.title: Srl include problem
channel.description:
hello everyone :) just a problem that im always getting. i try and run powerWCers and Powerminers using srl includes but i always get messages on SCAR 2.03 like this,
line 157: [error] (9173:4) : unknown identifier 'newchatmsg' in script c:\program files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\skill\woodcutting.scar
i also have had a message saying about 'processpicture' please help me in anyway you can
thankyou very much:)

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @sk84lifesam sk84lifesam
item.description:
@sk84lifesam wrote:

yup that is a plugins problem follow what ron has just said or read my tut of setting up SRL http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5881.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Okay this is right from the SRL manual.

How to install pups Box, Quiz and Certer solver: COPY BoxPlugin.dll, QuizPlugin.dll and CerterPlugin.dll from the place inside plugins folder to your SCAR/plugins Folder.

And version 3.17!? It says the latest version is 2.3???

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

but srl 3.17 doesnt have a folder called place in plugins!

its all very confusing is u ask me ill keep looking and trying

if not ill have to download it again

tyvm for ur help

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

hello to you all,

There is a folder in the SRL folder called “move these plugins into the plugins folder” or something, and you need to take those 3 .dll files in that folder and put it into this folder…

C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03\Plugins

~Ron

Read full topic

wrong section
